error.message: geoip cache tag might be unclear and does not contain the cache key in it.
Call to deprecated function file_unmanaged_copy(). Deprecated in drupal:8.7.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\File\FileSystemInterface::copy().
Call to deprecated function file_unmanaged_copy(). Deprecated in drupal:8.7.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\File\FileSystemInterface::copy().
Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to geoip.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.
